title: RocketSingh
author: RocketSingh
content: Thread Title: Do you see BTC @ $100k?Thread Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5388746.0Archive: https://loyce.club/archive/topics/538/5388746.htmlIt used to reside in Speculation board. Can it please be reinstate?

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: Quote from: https://loyce.club/archive/posts/5945/59456179.htmlIf yes, may be this NFT is for you!https//opensea.io/assets/0x495f947276749ce646f68ac8c248420045cb7b5e/53496462991669872108437993235344311823248474573025873625856059179090913001473This is the thread you created, did you really think this kind topic deserve to not get deleted? Your post is pointless and there's no discussion at all. What's the relation between Bitcoin price going to hit $100K and this shitcoins? you're just clickbait a title to make people interested with your worthless NFT.Another thing there's a thread about Bitcoin going to hit $100K before Bitcoin to hit $100k?

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: Quote from: RocketSingh on October 29, 2022, 11:15:55 PMCan it please be reinstate?Well It was quite rightly trashed, thus it can't be reinstated. Whilst some users might get the feeling of 'unjust' when they have their posts deleted, in your own case here you definitely shouldn't, everything about your post is wrong, the subject has no relationship with the content, wrong board to talk about NFT and subtle shilling. So don't waste everybody's time here, close this topic and follow the forum rules/etiquette whilst making a post next time and it won't be deleted.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: You created NFT sales on bitcoin discussion. It is not about bitcoin, it is about NFT, it is about marketing your NFT product. Assuming you have created if bitcoin would reach $100000, asking about what you think is possible but doubting, without including any NFT sales, probably it would not have been deleted.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Spam post must not be appreciated and reinstated, should it be? You are spamming everywhere with your NFT. Is it the way of promoting your project? You have another same kind of thread which has no value at all.Quote from: RocketSingh on March 07, 2022, 05:57:54 PMIf yes, may be this NFT is for you!https://opensea.io/assets/0x495f947276749ce646f68ac8c248420045cb7b5e/53496462991669872108437993235344311823248474573025873625856059176891889745921

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: RocketSingh on October 29, 2022, 11:15:55 PMIt used to reside in Speculation board. Can it please be reinstate?Perhaps the reason for the lack of intention to create a discussion, the way of narration shows that it is an indirect declaration and therefore zero benefit from discussions.You need to develop your marketing style instead of this way.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Such topics have no place in Bitcoin discussion or Economics -> Speculations, but should be exclusively in Altcoins boards, as has already been concluded countless times. I would have thought that the old-time Legendary member would distinguish Bitcoin from altcoins and not ask such pointless questions.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: RocketSingh on October 29, 2022, 11:15:55 PMCan it please be reinstate?No, it cannot. Read and abide by the forum rules:Quote from: mprep on July 21, 2014, 05:27:51 PM1. No zero or low value, pointless or uninteresting posts or threads. [1][e]~https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0And please stop posting low-quality content and spamming the forum just to promote your worthless NFTs if you want to continue being a member of this community.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: First of all, it is morally indecent to draw the attention of the community in such a "dirty" way. Secondly, you have a similar thread in the archives. I do not know who moved it there, but it does not change the essence. It's the same "dirty" marketing. I don't recommend taking it out of the archive, otherwise it will probably be deleted as well.

comments.author: Renampun
comments.body: Quote from: RocketSingh on October 29, 2022, 11:15:55 PMThread Title: Do you see BTC @ $100k?Thread Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5388746.0Archive: https://loyce.club/archive/topics/538/5388746.htmlIt used to reside in Speculation board. Can it please be reinstate?It's very clear that the trophy you created doesn't deserve to be in the Bitcoin discussion thread, you're selling your NFT there. but why should you be confused by that, you can create a new topic again related to your NFT sales, and because it is related to altcoins then create a new topic about your NFT sales in this section;>> Marketplace (Altcoins) good luck!

comments.author: KingsDen
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on October 30, 2022, 06:34:36 PMFirst of all, it is morally indecent to draw the attention of the community in such a "dirty" way. Secondly, you have a similar thread in the archives. I do not know who moved it there, but it does not change the essence. It's the same "dirty" marketing. I don't recommend taking it out of the archive, otherwise it will probably be deleted as well.I had first thought why the moderator that thrashed the post didn't consider moving it to altcoins section. But on viewing the scrapped post, I discovered that the post neither fit in Bitcoin board nor altcoins board. It is a sandwich of both, which made it a total trash.Most times I'll wonder how a legendary user wouldn't know what belongs to btc and altcoins and also how to structure posts for 3 to 4 years in the forum.

comments.author: UmerIdrees
comments.body: Quote from: RocketSingh on October 29, 2022, 11:15:55 PMIt used to reside in Speculation board. Can it please be reinstate?Sure, Why Not but before asking for restoring the thread can we ask the reason why that thread was so important that it should be restored?And the reason why it was deleted is already told by the mods, you are trying to market your NFT in an inappropriate way and this is not allowed here. Better follow the forum rules and f you need to promote something, do it in the right way in the right section. Quote from: Xal0lex on October 30, 2022, 06:34:36 PMFirst of all, it is morally indecent to draw the attention of the community in such a "dirty" way. Secondly, you have a similar thread in the archives. I do not know who moved it there, but it does not change the essence. It's the same "dirty" marketing. I don't recommend taking it out of the archive, otherwise it will probably be deleted as well.

comments.author: Sandra_hakeem
comments.body: Yeahhhhhh.... Look at that!..You got virtually everything wrong buddy; mixed up the content which doesn't even make 'em commensurate with the topic Title.Seriously, I'd be embarrassed if I'd make any post, questioning the mods 'bout why my previous shitty post were deleted -- wouldn't even dare try that advertently. Look,you just need to understand where, when,how and what to post cus you've got alot of peeps out here, reading through the whole gaddamn tautology. I learnt there's a mega thread already; why create another one? don't you make use of the "search topics " just so you'd evade this kinda trauma ?! I have read two posts today. You guys complained the same thing almost simultaneously.Sandra ðŸ’‡

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: You tried to advertise your NFT in the wrong section, and it didn't work. So now you changed your strategy a bit and thought: what could I do to still advertise my NFT but in a more subtle way? That's when you thought of this Meta complaint. Maybe I just have a vivid imagination and that wasn't your goal at all, but it's still advertising.Â  Â  "There is no such thing as bad publicity." It's just publicity.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: OP having your post deleted by the forum moderator is an unquestionable act, instead you should query yourself for making a mistake that could have led to that, you aren't a novice anymore to the forum, then why should you get so worried about your post being deleted? If i were you I would rather sit to correct myself and make the right thing that is need and post it appropriately as expected, first of all you aren't admitting the fact that you've made a mistake, should incase you don't know, forum moderators were selected to pass across fare judgement on people like you to have a coordinate organization of postings, so that you won't discover something funny one day unexpected with a post on any board.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: Despairo on October 30, 2022, 02:29:57 AMThis is the thread you created, did you really think this kind topic deserve to not get deleted? Your post is pointless and there's no discussion at all. What's the relation between Bitcoin price going to hit $100K and this shitcoins? you're just clickbait a title to make people interested with your worthless NFT.It's amazing that thread lasted more than half a year and had more than 200 (shit)posts! People should report more and post less on Speculation.
